channel.title: Adding server to the status list
channel.description:
hey guyz when ever i go to the status list and click add server it server has to be online to add to the list
but my server is online tho.....
can any1 plz tell me how to add ? do i have to register on fourms first?

item.title: Adding server to the status list
item.dc:creator: @_ara72421 §ara72421
item.description:
@_ara72421 wrote:

Here…

  1. http://www.portforward.com
  2. Look for your router
  3. Read what it says to do.
  4. Make sure No-Ip is set up correctly and is working
  5. It should work now.

Read full topic
item.source: Adding server to the status list

item.title: Adding server to the status list
item.dc:creator: @Darkning Darkning
item.description:
@Darkning wrote:

  1. portforward
  2. make sure you have no-ip setup correctly

must have been like 20th topic i saw for the same thing.

Read full topic
